DataSourceDefinition.Name: REP-057
DataSourceDefinition.Expression:
SELECT PAIS, SUBG, REGION, ZONA, N_CONCU, TERRI, COD_CLIE, NOMBRE, PERI, TC_TERRI, TC_ZONA, TC_REGION, TC_CONCU, CASE WHEN (CONTROL = 1) THEN PE END PE, NUM_PUNTOS
FROM ( SELECT PAIS, SUBG, REGION, ZONA, N_CONCU, TERRI, COD_CLIE, NOMBRE, PE, PERI, NUM_PUNTOS, TC_TERRI, TC_ZONA, TC_REGION, TC_CONCU, SUM(1) OVER (PARTITION BY PAIS, SUBG, REGION, ZONA, N_CONCU, TERRI, NOMBRE ORDER BY ROWNUM) CONTROL FROM ( SELECT GEN_PAIS.VAL_I18N PAIS, SUBG.DES_SUBG_VENT SUBG, REG.DES_REGI REGION, ZONA.DES_ZONA ZONA, CON_GEN.NUM_CONC N_CONCU, TER.COD_TERR TERRI, CLI.COD_CLIE, CLI.VAL_APE1||' '||CLI.VAL_APE2||' '||CLI.VAL_NOM1||' '||CLI.VAL_NOM2 NOMBRE, METAS.VAL_META/PUNTOS.VAL_FACT_CONV*PUNTOS.NUM_PUNT_ASIG PE, PERI.VAL_NOMB_PERI PERI, SUM(SOL_CON.NUM_PUNT) NUM_PUNTOS, COUNT(DISTINCT METAS.CLIE_OID_CLIE) OVER (PARTITION BY GEN_PAIS.VAL_I18N, CON_GEN.NUM_CONC, SUBG.DES_SUBG_VENT, REG.DES_REGI, ZONA.DES_ZONA, TER.COD_TERR) TC_TERRI, COUNT(DISTINCT METAS.CLIE_OID_CLIE) OVER (PARTITION BY GEN_PAIS.VAL_I18N, CON_GEN.NUM_CONC, SUBG.DES_SUBG_VENT, REG.DES_REGI, ZONA.DES_ZONA) TC_ZONA, COUNT(DISTINCT METAS.CLIE_OID_CLIE) OVER (PARTITION BY GEN_PAIS.VAL_I18N, CON_GEN.NUM_CONC, SUBG.DES_SUBG_VENT, REG.DES_REGI) TC_REGION, COUNT(DISTINCT METAS.CLIE_OID_CLIE) OVER (PARTITION BY GEN_PAIS.VAL_I18N, CON_GEN.NUM_CONC) TC_CONCU FROM INC_CONCU_PARAM_GENER CON_GEN, INC_OBTEN_PUNTO PUNTOS, INC_METAS_TIPO_VENTA METAS, MAE_CLIEN_UNIDA_ADMIN CLI_UA, ZON_SUB_GEREN_VENTA SUBG, ZON_REGIO REG, ZON_ZONA ZONA, INC_SOLIC_CONCU_PUNTA SOL_CON, ZON_SECCI SEC, ZON_TERRI_ADMIN TER_ADM, ZON_TERRI TER, MAE_CLIEN CLI, ( SELECT P.OID_PERI, P.FEC_INIC FROM CRA_PERIO P WHERE P.PAIS_OID_PAIS IN (%value_PAISVALUES%) %start_MARCAVALUES% AND P.MARC_OID_MARC IN (%value_MARCAVALUES%) %end_MARCAVALUES% ) PER_INI, ( SELECT P.OID_PERI, P.FEC_FINA FROM CRA_PERIO P WHERE P.PAIS_OID_PAIS IN (%value_PAISVALUES%) %start_MARCAVALUES% AND P.MARC_OID_MARC IN (%value_MARCAVALUES%) %end_MARCAVALUES% ) PER_FIN, CRA_PERIO PERI, ( SELECT GEN.VAL_OID, GEN.VAL_I18N FROM V_GEN_I18N_SICC GEN WHERE GEN.ATTR_ENTI = 'SEG_PAIS' AND GEN.IDIO_OID_IDIO = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% ) GEN_PAIS WHERE PUNTOS.COPA_OID_PARA_GRAL = CON_GEN.OID_PARA_GRAL AND SUBG.OID_SUBG_VENT = REG.ZSGV_OID_SUBG_VENT AND REG.OID_REGI = ZONA.ZORG_OID_REGI AND ZONA.OID_ZONA = SEC.ZZON_OID_ZONA AND SEC.OID_SECC = TER_ADM.ZSCC_OID_SECC AND TER.OID_TERR = TER_ADM.TERR_OID_TERR AND METAS.COPA_OID_PARA_GRAL = CON_GEN.OID_PARA_GRAL AND CLI_UA.ZTAD_OID_TERR_ADMI = TER_ADM.OID_TERR_ADMI AND CLI_UA.CLIE_OID_CLIE = METAS.CLIE_OID_CLIE AND METAS.CLIE_OID_CLIE = CLI.OID_CLIE AND SOL_CON.COPA_OID_PARA_GRAL = CON_GEN.OID_PARA_GRAL AND SOL_CON.CLIE_OID_CLIE = METAS.CLIE_OID_CLIE AND PERI.OID_PERI = SOL_CON.PERD_OID_PERI
AND CON_GEN.MARC_OID_MARC = SUBG.MARC_OID_MARC
AND CLI_UA.IND_ACTI = 1 AND CON_GEN.IND_ACTI = 1 AND PER_INI.OID_PERI = CON_GEN.PERD_OID_PERI_DESD AND PER_FIN.OID_PERI = CON_GEN.PERD_OID_PERI_HAST AND PERI.FEC_INIC >= PER_INI.FEC_INIC AND PERI.FEC_FINA < = PER_FIN.FEC_FINA AND PERI.PAIS_OID_PAIS = CON_GEN.PAIS_OID_PAIS
AND PERI.MARC_OID_MARC = CON_GEN.MARC_OID_MARC AND CON_GEN.PAIS_OID_PAIS = GEN_PAIS.VAL_OID(+)
AND CON_GEN.OID_PARA_GRAL IN (%value_NUMEROCONCURSOVALUES%) AND CON_GEN.PAIS_OID_PAIS IN (%value_PAISVALUES%) %start_MARCAVALUES% AND CON_GEN.MARC_OID_MARC IN (%value_MARCAVALUES%) %end_MARCAVALUES% %start_SUBGERENCIAVENTAVALUES% AND SUBG.OID_SUBG_VENT IN (%value_SUBGERENCIAVENTAVALUES%) %end_SUBGERENCIAVENTAVALUES% %start_REGIONVALUES% and reg.oid_regi in (%value_REGIONVALUES%) %end_REGIONVALUES% %start_ZONAVALUES% and zona.OID_ZONA in (%value_ZONAVALUES%) %end_ZONAVALUES%
GROUP BY GEN_PAIS.VAL_I18N, SUBG.DES_SUBG_VENT, REG.DES_REGI, ZONA.DES_ZONA, CON_GEN.NUM_CONC, TER.COD_TERR,
METAS.CLIE_OID_CLIE, CLI.COD_CLIE, CLI.VAL_APE1||' '||CLI.VAL_APE2||' '||CLI.VAL_NOM1||' '||CLI.VAL_NOM2, PERI.VAL_NOMB_PERI, METAS.VAL_META/PUNTOS.VAL_FACT_CONV*PUNTOS.NUM_PUNT_ASIG ) )
